page.title: 01Collingbourne Kingston Area
page.content: The four mile by three mile area of this report consists of two villages seperated by farmland. The village of Collingbourne Kingston lies to the north east of the area and was orignally known as Collingbourne Kingstone. This village was mentioned in the first Domesday Book. The village of Everleigh lies to the south west of Collingbourne Kingston some three miles away. There have been eleven births in Everleigh during the last twelve months which shows that although only a small village, like that of Collingbourne Kingston, it is regenerating. The farmland between the villages covers most aspects of farming, including a 'Pig Village', which is a large number of mobile stys which are moved from field to field as required.
